com.deltaxml.api

Class XMLCombinerFactoryConfigurationError

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Error
        • com.deltaxml.api.DeltaXMLError
          • com.deltaxml.api.XMLCombinerFactoryConfigurationError
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class XMLCombinerFactoryConfigurationError
extends DeltaXMLError

    This class is used to indicate an error in the configuration of a XMLCombiner factory. Such errors may include:

    • Detecting a SecurityException when attempting to read a property value
    • Not being able to locate or instantiate the default factory implementation

    Note that this class ultimately extends from java.lang.Error (because it is not expected to occur in normal use) and thus does not need to be declared in method throws clauses.

    Many, if not all, uses of this Error will be caused by other Errors or Exceptions being thrown. The wrapped Exceptions should be checked using methods such as DeltaXMLError.getThrowable().

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • XMLCombinerFactoryConfigurationError

        public XMLCombinerFactoryConfigurationError(java.lang.Exception e)

        Construct a new error which wraps another exception. The wrapped exception is often the base cause of the exception. By wrapping the exception its detail message and stack trace can be obtained after calling getException()

        Parameters:
        e - The exception to wrap.
        See Also:
        DeltaXMLError.getThrowable()

      • XMLCombinerFactoryConfigurationError

        public XMLCombinerFactoryConfigurationError(java.lang.String msg,
                                            java.lang.Exception e)

        Construct a new error which wraps another exception and which also supplies an additional detail message.

        The new detail message can be obtained via getMessage() whilst the detail message of the wrapped exception or error can be obtained via getException().getMessage()
        Parameters:
        e - The exception to wrap.
        msg - The new or additional message reported with the error.
